instance.description: Lists the references in configuration files to vendor-specific structures.
instance.longDescription: Lists the references in configuration files to vendor-specific structures, along with the line number, the name and the type of the structure referenced, and configuration context in which each reference occurs.

names.description: Include structures whose name matches this string or regex

nodes.description: Include files used to generate nodes whose name matches this specifier

types.description: Include structures whose vendor-specific type matches this specifier
